body_html:
@klappradla @branquinhoaa Adding more info is a good idea! I'd actually add more info to both view and edit pages.

Maybe something like:

Conference preferences (edit form):

RGSoC provides the students an opportunity to attend a conference during or after the Summer of Code. Please select one or two conferences you are interested in. In case you don't find it in the list, feel free to add it.

Adding a new conference:

Please make sure that the conference you are adding is tech and has a good Code of Conduct!

Conference preferences (view form):

Conferences you are interested in attending:

@klappradla I'd emphasise interest here, because we don't guarantee anything to the students. As much as I tried to make it clear last year, there still were students who said: "Oh, we thought RGSoC would give us the tickets to the conference we chose" in the end :/

Conference offers (edit form):

Please select one or more conferences free tickets to which you would like to offer to the students.

Conference offers (view form):

Free tickets offered by RGSoC. Please accept of reject the offer(s).

Something like this, but we can of course change the wording.

body:
@klappradla @branquinhoaa Adding more info is a good idea! I'd actually add more info to both view and edit pages.

Maybe something like:

**Conference preferences (edit form):**
> RGSoC provides the students an opportunity to attend a conference during or after the Summer of Code. Please select one or two conferences you are interested in. In case you don't find it in the [list](https://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/conferences), feel free to add it.

**Adding a new conference:**
> Please make sure that the conference you are adding is tech and has a good Code of Conduct!

**Conference preferences (view form):**
> Conferences you are interested in attending:

@klappradla I'd emphasise *interest* here, because we don't guarantee anything to the students. As much as I tried to make it clear last year, there still were students who said: "Oh, we thought RGSoC would give us the tickets to the conference we chose" in the end :/

**Conference offers (edit form):**
> Please select one or more conferences free tickets to which you would like to offer to the students.

**Conference offers (view form):**
> Free tickets offered by RGSoC. Please accept of reject the offer(s). 

Something like this, but we can of course change the wording.
